content: GF#12973 - onset-age expression should include Condition.onset.as(Age)

Shouldn't Age replace Quantity? Is there another dimension one could measure? and wouldn't a partial date convey the string example? I think this still needs some though - this key issue is the missing use of this searchable element in an example.
I think they've got an example that includes onsetAge, which would make the warning go away.
Why didn't that throw an error given that Age is not a valid choice (which is why they are adding it)?
It's a valid choice in the model, it just wasn't listed as something to match against in the search
Yes, Quantity isn't a valid selection there, condition onset doesn't have quantity as one of the options
this would replace as(Quantity) though since Age is a Quantity, it's not a functional change
Based on call discussion, no approval is required as non-substantive
